verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote, <S%H5221><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> from the river <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H6160><s%> on the east: <S%H4217><s%>

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and ruled <S%H4910><s%> from Aroer, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the river, <S%H5158><s%> and from half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

And from the plain <S%H6160><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinneroth <S%H3672><s%> on the east, <S%H4217><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain, <S%H6160><s%> even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> on the east, <S%H4217><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to Beth-jeshimoth; <S%H1020><s%> and from the south, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8486><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> Ashdoth-pisgah: <S%H798><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which was of the remnant <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3499><s%> of the giants, <S%H7497><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and at Edrei, <S%H154><s%>

And reigned <S%H4910><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and in Salcah, <S%H5548><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maachathites, <S%H4602><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>

Them did Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smite: <S%H5221><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it for a possession <S%H3425><s%> unto the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%> from Baal-gad <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak, <S%H2510><s%> that goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to Seir; <S%H8165><s%> which Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%> according to their divisions; <S%H4256><s%>

In the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and in the valleys, <S%H8219><s%> and in the plains, <S%H6160><s%> and in the springs, <S%H794><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and in the south <S%H5045><s%> country; the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai, <S%H5857><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Debir, <S%H1688><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Geder, <S%H1445><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Hormah, <S%H2767><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad, <S%H6166><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah, <S%H4719><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Tappuah, <S%H8599><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Aphek, <S%H663><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lasharon, <S%H8289><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon, <S%H4068><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron-meron, <S%H8112><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph, <S%H407><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Taanach, <S%H8590><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Megiddo, <S%H4023><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> of Carmel, <S%H3760><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> in the coast <S%H5299><s%> of Dor, <S%H1756><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> of Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> one: <S%H259><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and one. <S%H259><s%>
